abstract: Formula One is the pinnacle of auto racing and the 2012 season begins next week at the Australian Grand Prix, a season with more questions than certainties. To mark the occasion, Brad Spurgeon's Formula One blog moves to Rendezvous. In his first post, Brad introduces the IHT's season preview, his Virtual Paddock - and a novel deal from Malaysia: free tickets to its Grand Prix for U.S. tourists...
